migrate.title: OpenWeatherMap API V2.5 deprecated
migrate.description:
OWM API v2.5 will be closed in June 2024.
You need to migrate all your OpenWeatherMap integrations to v3.0.

Before the migration, you must have an active subscription (be aware that subscription activation can take up to 2h). After your subscription is activated, select **Submit** to migrate the integration to API V3.0. Read the documentation for more information.
